member.name: M:GameOfLifeAPI.Controllers.GameOfLifeController.Get
member.summary: Return the board saved in memory.

member.name: M:GameOfLifeAPI.Controllers.GameOfLifeController.Post
member.summary: Returns the next board in the game and save it in memory.

member.name: M:GameOfLifeAPI.Controllers.GameOfLifeController.PostNewBoard(System.String)
